'Vivian Davis Figures' (born January 24, 1957) is a Democratic member of the
Alabama Senate, representing the 33rd District in Mobile County since she was
elected on January 28, 1997 to serve the remaining term of her late husband,
Senator Michael A. Figures, who was the President Pro Tempore of the Senate. She
was re-elected without opposition in 1998 and 2002.
